transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: (Erik Estrada is on control room monitor, putting on make-up. As Moltar speaks, monitor shows text
Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Um, uh, Erik, um, Hi, um, I'm, I'm Moltar, and, um, I, I really like your show, you know, that, that "CHiPs" show? Where, where you guys, like, wreck all that stuff, all the cars...

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: (to make-up person) Got any rouge?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Connie! Get in there and get that man some rouge! This is Erik Estrada, fer cryin' out loud! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I've gotta do it all around here. Yup, I'm the captain of this show. That's enough, Connie, he's not a clown! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Thank you. Hi, Moltar. (winks)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) You're the man, Erik! You and me, we got a thing goin'. We like each other!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Uh, thanks. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)(monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings! I'm Space G-

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Go to the desk!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (surprised) Okay. (invisos to desk) Uh, what now?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Erik Estrada, Poncharello, the CHiPs-master! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Here he is, now! (sends Erik to studio monitor) Aw-riiiiight!Woo hoo hoo hoo...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts monitor with his power bands, George Clinton takes Erik's place) Cut it out, Moltar, that music guy is first.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aaaa! (throws lever, Erik returns) Ponch is first!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts monitor again) Music guy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever again) Erik!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts monitor again) Music guy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever again) Erik! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Where's Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (rises from center of keyboard pod, on an elevator platform) I was, just doing something. Down there. Without you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares at Zorak, then blasts monitor again and again) Music guy, music guy, music guy, music guy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever again and again, monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Erik, Erik, Erik, Erik, Erik, Erik, Erik!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, my show, my show!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (grumbles, sends George to studio monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now just settle down, we'll get to Erik. (quietly to himself) When the earth cools. (normal voice) Ladies and gentlemen, Dr. Funkenstien himself, Mr. George Clinton!

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Roof, roof, roof, how ya doin?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (sends Erik back to monitor) That was great, bring on Erik.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! I just started here.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I thought you were done!(monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gimme back George Clinton!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, I dropped him.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Good move!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And he broke. So there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares at Zorak) Aren't you busy with something?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah, thanks for reminding me. (lowers on elevator platform in his keyboard pod) See ya later.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's he doin'?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (shadows flicker, sounds of flames in background) (Oooooh, look at all that human hair! Cool!)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (listens to wolf howling, changing to dog barking, while monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Who owns that dog? (more barking) And where's that music guy!?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (makes "I dunno" noise)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Send him out, Moltar! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Send him out, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Send him out, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Send him out, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Send him out, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm not gonna tell you again!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh-uh

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm telling you, I'm not gonna tell you again! I am telling you, I am not gonna tell you again!!! (While Space Ghost talks, monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No no no no no no no no no no no no no no...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tiiiiime ouuuuut!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aw man! (walks off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And you will stay in 'time out' until I am done with the funkmaster. I'm really sorry, George, Moltar's got this Estrada problem.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wearing a Howard Cosell-like toupee) Yeah, he wants to shake his hand, and then pull it up to his mouth real quick, so he can kiss it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to George) That's Zorak.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I was wonderin' who was that guy...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look at him, he's got a full head of hair.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, yeah, that toupee look funny.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What toupee? This is my natural hair.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Oh, that, that figures, that was fake.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: This is the ancient hair from a young king's tomb. It gives me... the power...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The power to do what?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh... stuff.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What kind of stuff?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Powerful stuff! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Oh, he has a good ??? on top of his head, that's a nice trick.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No trick Zorak plays is ever nice. Watch as I destroy him!

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: I kinda figured you would do that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (coughs) I paid forty dollars for that rug!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And look what it got you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: The king will be very disappointed.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: King like that don't need hair. Speaking of hair, what's up with your 'do?

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Oh, my 'do. Well, what comes around, went that way. And I can get around, you know what I'm sayin'?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No. I wear a hood.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: You wear a 'hood? I, I live in a 'hood. You have a 'hood, yeah, but how would I wear a 'hood?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's not hard. I take an entire neighborhood, put it on my head and dance around where the neighborhood used to be. The people who live in the neighborhood are terrified by my hopping, and some of them fall off my head and are trampled. It is then that the dance becomes a dance of sadness.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Why are you tellin' me this?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because I care about the innocent victims of my ill-advised dance of joy.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Oh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Fries don't come with that deadly shake.

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: (laughing) Shake like that don't need fries.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (off-screen) Can I come out now? I've been very good!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Have you learned your lesson? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You mean, don't go strippin' in the woods?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's a good lesson, Moltar, albeit not exactly the lesson I had... (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm comin' out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, all right.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (walks up to control room monitor) What's this joker still doin' here? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: George Clinton
transcript.dialogue: Go forth and funk, my child.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Funk this, you wookie! (throws lever, replaces George with Erik)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This is nuts. (invisos to control room, monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bring him back, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Let go of the lever.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You let go of the lever!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm serious. Let go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, you let go!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Let go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I said, let go! (As Space Ghost and Moltar throw the lever back and forth, the monitor switches between Estrada and Clinton, along with various other pictures, including a full screen of mirrored text, which includes the line "imagining Zorak Deck")

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I said, let go! (Amongst the images on the monitor are the hallway from the show opening, and the Cartoon Network Productions Jack-in-the-box logo from the end.)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I said, let go!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I said it, too!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gimme that lever, I'm gonna...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in his subterranean cavern) (The breach of peace, fueled by a sprinkle of pandemonium. The vultures have come.)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: If you don't let go of that lever right now, I'm going to punch you in the nose!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I don't have a nose!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh, you don't?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I have a cadmium alloy inhalant receptacle.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh... uh, well, then I'll... kick you in the hands!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, please, not the hands!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here I go, kicking you in the hands!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ow.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Put your hands down here! (a hit to Moltar's face: "BLONNG!")

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Come on, pretty boy! How's that feel? (a hit to Space Ghost's face: "THOKK!") You like that? You like that?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in cavern, over continued fighting from Space Ghost and Moltar) (To the death, you toads! Spread the hatred far and wide! [evil laugh])

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're hurting me.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: ??? that's my hand.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not fair, let go of my cape.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: ??? the mask.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not the mask! Not the mask!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, Moltar, I... guess I lost the fight.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, Space Ghost, I lost... the fight.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We both lost, therefore we both won. I apologize.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Aaaa, ya big lug. I love you too.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Give me a big old hug. (off camera) Ohhhh yeah!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Frak!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk) Hello everybody! And now, back to the show.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Pinhead.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nothin'. Moltworm.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What did you say, just then?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nothin'!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't remember where...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Snapdragon.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ... I heard that, you said 'snapdragon'.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Did not!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did too!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in Exorcist voice) Did Not!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's creepy, idn't it?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in same voice) Yes. (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And now, let's welcome Erik Estrada. (appears on monitor)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hang on a second, I, I wrote some questions for him.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, hurry up!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (walks out, plops down questions on Space Ghost's desk) Here! (walks off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to the show, citizen!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Thank you! Hi, Moltar! (winks)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (still next to Space Ghost's desk) You're the man! Woo hoo!! Yeah!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gonna stand there all day?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm not hurtin' anything. Just talk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't worry, I'll read your stupid questions.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You better. (walks off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar's first question... well, it's not really a question, it just says "Moltar is your number one fan."

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I know, we're buds.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You are the man!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Question t-

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wooooo!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Question two says: How do you handle the pressures of being an international sex symbol?

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhhh, how do I handle it? Well, you just have to, just, you say, "Okay, thank you, I take that as a compliment."

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, thank you, I take that as a compliment.

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: And don't, don't get offended by it, or don't think that it gives you a license to... practice sex, with just anybody.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Okay.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in cavern) (Oh, the sounds of happiness fester in my brain!)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Let me ask a question!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Sure! Go on, Molt. We know each other, I can call him Molt. (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Woo doggie!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in Exorcist voice) Shut Up!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You and me, Zorak, after the show!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in same voice) You name the time, scab!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I thought I just did!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in normal voice) Oh, right. After the show. (screen goes dark, except for his eyes) (What am I becoming?)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ask your question!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever, Erik reappears on control room monitor) Erik, why was Sergeant Katrare always so mean? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Well, the sergeant never got out of the station much. And he didn't get to ride and meet the people, meet all the children...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Or maybe your pants were too tight. Or maybe... (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Oh...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (clears throat) Hey, remember the episode where you save Heather Locklear from the biker gang? (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Yes.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, and, and remember the time when the skateboarder grabbed onto the back of that Chevy Malibu?

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Right, right. (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And kept on skating? That was so cool! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: That wasn't very smart, that wasn't really cool.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's what I meant. That was totally uncool!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Let the power of Ponch compel you! (repeats over and over) (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Zorak? Who's Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That thing, over there!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: That's pretty mean, huh?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... Let the power of Ponch compel you! ... (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I said, shut up! You're wrecking my interview!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... Let the power of Ponch compel you! ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stop yelling! (silence on the set)

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Let the power of Ponch compel you! ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Shut up! ??? you idiots anymore!

transcript.speaker: Erik Estrada
transcript.dialogue: (pretending to talk into walkie-talkie) Hey, Baker, this is Seven Mary Three, we've got a 9-11 in progress, I need your audible, drop that burrito and get over here. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: A 9-1-1 in progress? Up, up and away! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... Let the power of Ponch compel you! ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You ruined my chance of a lifetime!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... Let the power of Ponch compel you! ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Shut. Up. Shut up!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (blows up)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Erik? Just gimme a second, I can fix it. (pulls lever, Erik blows up) Noooooo!!!! Oh no. (Moltar blows up)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (mocking voice) "911, better hurry! 911!" Hate this job! Hey, it's hot in here. (sighs) Wonder if the air conditioner's broken... (turns knob) (Space Ghost blows up)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm here for you, to make children smile, to make profits rise. I am the subservient of the network. (Pause) Did we get all that on tape?
